synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: Tb(NO3)3.5H2O (21.8 mg, 0.05 mmol), 2-FBA (56.4 mg, 0.4 mmol), DMF (2 mL), H2O (0.5 mL)
synthesis_conditions.method: solution was heated then left to evaporate slowly at room temperature in a ventilated fume hood
synthesis_conditions.yield: octahedral crystals harvested after approximately two months

synthesis_conditions.chemicals_used: Y(NO3)3.6H2O (8.6 mg, 0.0225 mmol), H3BTB (6.6 mg, 0.015 mmol), 2-FBA (95.2 mg, 0.675 mmol), DMF (2 mL), H2O (0.5 mL)
synthesis_conditions.method: solution was heated then washed with DMF, soaked in DMF overnight, and exchanged in MeOH for one week
solution was heated then washed with DMF, soaked in DMF overnight, and exchanged in EtOH for one week
